department.dept_long_name: Committee on Mind, Brain, and Behavior

course.title: Addiction, Choice, and Motivation
course.description: Seeks a comprehensive understanding of addiction and why it has been such a contentious topic. Readings and discussion address (1) the characteristics of addiction as revealed in biographies, epidemiological studies, clinical research, experiments, and historical "natural experiments"; (2) how drugs work; (3) the functional significance of drug-induced neural changes; (4) genetic influences on alcohol use in the context of gene expression (4) a behavioral economic analysis of impulsivity and addiction.
